description: Primes with digits in descending order that differ exactly by 1.
comments: Primes in A138142. - _Omar E. Pol_, Dec 07 2008
mathematica: fQ[n_]:=Module[{id=IntegerDigits[n],}, n < 10 || Union[Differences[id]] == {-1}]; Select[Prime[Range[10000]], fQ] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 29 2010 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1999
